name: BadCounter
0:
”Alexa, ask Bad Counter to count from one to five hundred.”
”Alexa, ask Bad Counter to tell me the numbers between twelve and sixteen.”
”Alexa, open Bad Counter.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bad counter
des:
Let Alexa count for you!

Just say "Bad Counter, count to seven" and you will hear Alexa counting from one to seven.
You can also specify the start number by saying "Bad Counter, count from four to nine".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
